title: Report: YouTube offering podcasters $50-300K ‘grants’ to make video versions of shows
content:
YouTube’s interest in the podcasting space is quite explicit at this point, and the latest effort is offering grants to make video podcasts that are more native to the network.

more…

The post Report: YouTube offering podcasters $50-300K ‘grants’ to make video versions of shows appeared first on 9to5Google.
